title: Learn a new language and a lot more for just $160 with this Rosetta Stone special
description:
Want to learn something new? The web is full of great resources and you don’t have to pay a premium to access some of the best learning materials around. Right now, we’re offering The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Subscription Bundle ft. Rosetta Stone for an extra $30 off when you use promo code ROSETTA.

This bundle includes lifetime access to the “Gold Standard of Language Learning,” Rosetta Stone. Trusted by international organizations like TripAdvisor and NASA for three decades, Rosetta Stone is one of the best ways to learn a new language.

Plus, you’ll also get StackSkills Unlimited, an online learning library full of more than 1,000 courses on practically anything you want to learn. From coding to graphic design, StackSkills Unlimited offers top-rated courses from some of the web’s best instructors.

You really can learn something new every day. Normally valued at $749, you can get Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited for just $160 when you use promo code ROSETTA.

 

The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Subscription Bundle ft. Rosetta Stone – $160

See Deal

Prices are subject to change.
